thread.section_title: Life Style Sports Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Life Style Sports | lifestylesports.com
thread.title: Mr C Bradley
thread.title_full: Life Style Sports reviewed by Mr C Bradley

author: Mr C Bradley
title: Mr C Bradley
text: My son wanted a pair of trainers for his 14th birthday...I ordered them no problem at all. This was on a Wednesday. I was so happy and thought I was sorted. On the Monday 5 days after ordering I received a phone call saying the website wasn't up to date and the item I'd ordered and paid for wasn't actually available!
